description:
Two boys have a great destiny to fulfill. A fox and a raccoon get in a competition to see who can trick the other. A boy goes deep underground and finds a terrible country of demons.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sadame o Seotta Futari no Wakamono / Osan Gitsune to Yosaburou Danuki / Chitei no Kuni
Two Young Boys with a Destiny / Osan the Fox and Yosaburou the Raccoon / The Underground Country
さだめを背負った二人の若者 / おさん狐と与三郎狸 / 地底の国
